participant_1.background:
I was disappointed when my family didn't want to go camping anymore.
I and my mom like to listen to the Beatles together.
I am close to my family, and we enjoy spending time together.
I'm not sure I could pick just one, but building a house for my family was definitely one of the hardest things I've ever done.
i have two adopted kids.

participant_2.background:
I had to say goodbye to my dog, Buddy.
my name is dave.
my family is very supportive of my skiing.
I am not sure if it is fair to tax the rich more than the poor, but I do know that cats are awesome.
I have never been arrested but my parents are worried I'm lonely.

content.text: Hi Dave, how's it going?
Good, how about you?
Pretty good, thanks. I'm sad to hear about your dog, Buddy. I know how hard that can be.
Thanks. It was tough, but I'm starting to heal.
That's good to hear. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to ski, and I'm also a big fan of the Beatles.
Oh, me too! I grew up listening to the Beatles with my mom.
That's great! What's your favorite song?
I think my favorite song is "Hey Jude." It's so uplifting and positive.
That's a great song! Mine is "Strawberry Fields Forever."
That's a good one too! I love the psychedelic sound.
Me too. It's one of my favorite Beatles songs.
I'm glad we have similar taste in music.
Me too! It's always nice to find someone who likes the same things you do.
Definitely. What are some of your other interests?
I like to read, and I'm also a big fan of science fiction and fantasy novels.
Oh, me too! I love reading science fiction and fantasy novels. I'm currently reading a book called "The Martian."
That's a great book! I've read it twice.
I'm really enjoying it so far. I'm about halfway through it.
It's a really good book. I hope you enjoy the rest of it.
Thanks, I'm sure I will
